feed.title: GitHub ShaderLab Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of ShaderLab in GitHub

entry.title: BBelk/StarfieldDigipickSim
entry.summary: A recreation of Starfield's Digipick/Lockpicking Minigame in Unity/C#

entry.title: Unity-Technologies/Volume_Lights_System
entry.summary: This project demonstrates how URP's DepthNormals prepass can be used to create mesh-volume-based lights; that is, the illusion of simple lighting rendered on the backfaces of box meshes placed in a scene.
